automation_yaml:
id: 'daily_5pm_office_living_room_fade'
alias: Daily 5pm Office & Living Room fade
description: "Daily 5:00 PM routine: brighten the Office WLED to ~80%, then Living Room to ~60%, then dim Office to ~40%."
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: time
    at: '17:00:00'
conditions: []
action:
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness_pct: 80
  - delay: '00:01:00'
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.living_room_2
    data:
      brightness_pct: 60
  - delay: '00:00:30'
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness_pct: 40
